title: Pool Party Tracker?
body:
Heya guys! Wondering if anyone would know… this whole Pool Party thing, it's very unclear. You're supposed to get 5 points for winning a 5 man premade game on LoL. I've done this several times now, on Norms and Aram, and neither time has an announcement popped up or anything. Nobody in the 'Pool Party' chatroom seems to know, and I can't find anywhere that says what notification - if any - you're supposed to get, or where you can see your own personal points. Heck, even the global point tracker is still not functioning.

Any thoughts? Would be keen to know so I don't miss out, and can also help the many others who are asking the same questions.

replies.body:
As far as I know, there's no individual point tracker planned on being released. But, the universal one should be functioning.

Bug reports should go [here](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/bug-report).
